exceptions.exn: In environment x : network Unable to unify "(let (_, nwState) := x in nwState) primary" with "(let (_, nwState) := x in nwState) backup".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros net tr H. induction H. - unfold step_async_init. simpl. unfold init_handlers. unfold nwState. simpl. apply le_refl. - apply le_trans with (nwState y primary). + apply IHstep_async_star. + unfold step_async in H0. destruct_pending. simpl in H0. rewrite H0. apply backup_plus_network_eq_primary.
